job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant business discipline from an accredited four-year college or university.

jd:
Job Description -Need local or nearby candidates with LinkedIn with actual genuine visa

Senior Oracle PL/SQL Developer - 2 openings 6 months+

Locations: - : 3 days onsite a week- Houston, TX

Skype***Must be local to Houston or TX and be willing to come into the downtown office Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday of every week***

Design, develop, test, maintain, and support batch applications using Oracle PL/SQL for Retail Commissions and Amortization.

Education:
Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering or relevant business discipline from an accredited four-year college or university.

Experience:
12+ years of strong development experience using Oracle PL/SQL including experience using features like Analytical functions, merge statements, WITH clause, oracle partitioning, job logging, exception handling, performance tuning
10+ years of experience in Oracle 12c or 19c
5+ years of experience in a Data Warehouse environment
Strong Analytical skills
Troubleshooting skills
Strong Team Player

Additional skills:
Flexibility, Dedication, Consistency, Integrity, and Enthusiasm a must.
